author: andreypz
body:
#### PR description:

Updating DT Calibration workflows to run in the latest CMSSW releases.
Details on the workflows are documented here: [CMS/DTCalibrationTools](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/DTCalibrationTools)

The updates mainly include minor fixes to a few script to make them run in the latest CMSSW version, and some additional debug print statements.

#### PR validation:

We have run the calibration procedure on one recent Runs and it works as expected.

#### Other Notes
According to [this tutorial](http://cms-sw.github.io/tutorial.html)  I'm supposed to make a PR to `master` branch. But when I try that, it introduced a lot of older commits. I don't know how to deal with this. 
When I make PR to `15_0_X` branch, it looks as expected.
Let me know if I am supposed to run some additional commands to merge to master
title: Updating DT Calibration workflows for CMSSW_15_0_5
